Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController

Class ReconnectionWaitController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.GUIController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.ReconnectionWaitController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener, StateListener, UI
public class ReconnectionWaitController extends GUIController implements StateListener
A scene controller used to wait for reconnection and signaling to user that network problems have arisen.
